MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the SY10 postcode area of Penybontfawr, affecting properties in Hirnant and surrounding areas. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and we are working to restore power for those customers still without power. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of broken equipment on the overhead line network and our team are now working to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4:00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:00PM 8th November 2020
